item.title: ‘The Naked Gun’ Review: Liam Neeson Skewers Himself in an Engaging Goofball Grab Bag of a Reboot That Rarely Shocks You Into Laughter
item.description: What it won’t do the way these films once used to is to shock you into laughter.
